overview: Captioning: A caption can not only improve the visual appeal of a video, but can also help in increasing the comprehension, and level of interest of the viewer. There are several captioning styles, but captions can be broadly divided as closed captions and open captions. In a world that is a melting pot of different languages, accents and cultures a caption has an important role to play in conveying clearly what needs to be said.
